👉 This video was recorded with the following:
🔵 Chair: https://amzn.to/3D2J2Jb
🔵 Camera: https://amzn.to/3eO58my
🔵 Microphone: https://bit.ly/ae5400
🔵 HDMI capture: https://amzn.to/3cMzhRq
🔵 Audio interface: https://bit.ly/2i2audio

00:00 Introduction
00:15 Some history
00:20 I applauded Apple's IRP program
00:50 This was a mistake
01:20 Apple IRP program was a bad program
01:30 IRP has bad parts availability
01:50 IRP had logistics issues making it unusable
02:30 IRP audits wouldn't allow me to do repairs
03:48 I hope you understand my skepticism
04:37 Let's read the announcement
05:17 Charge ports?
07:55 We need more information
08:30 How deep will this go? This is what matters
09:19 Screen vs. screen assembly
10:39 Top case vs. keyboard 
13:19 Headline vs. reality
14:04 More cynicism
14:49 Plea to Apple to do this right

title: Argument against heavy wholesale discounts when starting your repair career
description:
https://tinyurl.com/rossmatrix
